title: Some dialogues between Mr. G. and others with reflections upon a book called Pax vobis.
author: Lynford, Thomas, 1650-1724.
publisher: printed for Randall Taylor, near Stationers-Hall,
notes: Attributed by Wing to Thomas Lynford.
Running title: Reflections upon Pax vobis.

Reproduction of the original at the Bodleian Library.
